name: Extract time entries from Everhour and send them as a table via Gmail
description:
This template periodically extracts time entries from Everhour and sends them as a table via Gmail with these columns:
1) created at
2) task name
3) project name
4) client name
5) cost

The scenario is scheduled to run every Monday at 8 am. You can change the scheduling after you are done setting up this template. If you change the frequency, you will also need to change lookback windows in the first module.  The current template is configured to send the time entries for the last 7 days.
